title: Stattik shiv passive without any items bug?
body: I was playing ashe and the only items I had was a doran's blade and a pot, but above my abilities where my "status effects" were, I had the stattik shiv "charging" passive. When the passive was fully charged it wouldn't deal bonus damage on auto, but i noticed it would give me a temporary speed boost after I autoed someone. I would have screenshots, but my print screen thing bugged out.

replies.body: Lol it's alright. I got really confused when I saw it, too. It took me a few minutes before I realized that the patch with the Warlord's changes went through
Thats Warlord's Bloodlust. It's a passive that charges up and has the same icon as SS and RFC. Read what your masteries do my man.
Erm...it's the new Warlord's Bloodlust mastery. Check it out in the mastery page for more info.
